title: Bloomberg Markets: Buffett's BofA Bet, Future According to Musk
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Buffett's BofA Bet, Future According to Musk
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Noah Buhayar Reporter Bloomberg Editorial Discussing Warren Buffett's bet on Bank of America bringing in roughly $12 billion. Tom Randall Deputy Sustainability Editor Bloomberg News Discussing his Bloomberg Businessweek story "The Future According to Musk."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
